tool_description: Calculates wind loads on structures according to building codes, considering building geometry, exposure category, importance factor, and local wind speeds.

basic_wind_speed.description: Basic wind speed in km/h or mph

building_height.description: Building height above ground in meters or feet

building_width.description: Building width perpendicular to wind direction in meters or feet

exposure_category.description: Wind exposure category (A, B, C, D)

importance_factor.description: Building importance factor based on occupancy

building_code.description: Building code for wind load calculations (ASCE7, NBCC, AS1170, Eurocode1)

topographic_factor.description: Topographic factor for hills, ridges, escarpments

error_messages: Invalid wind parameters: basic_wind_speed must be positive, typically between 90-300 km/h or 55-185 mph
Invalid building geometry: building_height and building_width must be positive
Unknown exposure category: Use one of [A, B, C, D]
Invalid importance factor: importance_factor must be between 0.8 and 1.5
Unsupported building code: Use one of [ASCE7, NBCC, AS1170, Eurocode1]
Invalid factors: topographic_factor must be â‰¥ 1.0, gust_factor between 0.5-2.0, pressure_coefficient between -2.0 and 2.0
usage: Provide basic_wind_speed, building_height, building_width, exposure_category, importance_factor, and building_code. Optionally specify topographic_factor, gust_factor, and pressure_coefficient for refined calculations.

design_wind_pressure.description: Design wind pressure in kPa or psf

total_wind_force.description: Total wind force on building in kN or lbs
